alert.M5.div: Element metadataStandardName must be present and equal to 'DM - Regole tecniche RNDT'

alert.M6.div: Element metadataStandardVersion must be present and equal to '10 novembre 2011'

alert.M9.div: Responsible Party is missing or has a wrong value. Responsible Party must contain organisationName,role,and electronicMailAddress elements and at least one of phone and onlineResource elements

alert.M15.div: Dataset Responsible Party is missing or has a wrong value. Dataset Responsible Party must contain organisationName,role,and electronicMailAddress elements and at least one of phone and onlineResource elements

alert.M31.div: Element Spatial Representation Type must be present

strings.M32: Data Identification - Spatial Resolution of the Dataset

alert.M32.div: Element Spatial Resolution must be present

strings.M33: Data Identification - Geographic Location of the Dataset

alert.M33.div: Element Geographic Location must be present

alert.M35.div: Positional accuracy is missing or has a wrong value

alert.M37.div: Conformance Report - Specification is missing or has a wrong value

alert.M38.div: Reference System is missing or has a wrong value

strings.alert.M99: Metadata date must be documented through element gco:Date
strings.alert.M100: Dates must be documented through element gco:Date
strings.alert.M110: No element must have attribute gco:nilReason
